entry.title: Yeh Hai Muqaddar Ka Sikandar - Bollywood Blockbuster Movie - Chiranjeevi , Bhanu Priya
entry.content:
![Yeh hai Muqaddar ka Sikandar - Bollywood Blockbuster Movie - Chiranjeevi , Bhanu Priya](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/XnHG6KBuTcg/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Yeh hai Muqaddar ka Sikandar - Bollywood Blockbuster Movie - Chiranjeevi , Bhanu Priya](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/XnHG6KBuTcg/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Yeh hai Muqaddar ka Sikandar - Bollywood Blockbuster Movie - Chiranjeevi , Bhanu Priya](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/XnHG6KBuTcg/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Yeh hai Muqaddar ka Sikandar - Bollywood Blockbuster Movie - Chiranjeevi , Bhanu Priya](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/XnHG6KBuTcg/3.jpg =1580x150)

Story of two twin brothers named Yuvraj & Raju. Raju wants to take revenge of his parents murder and therefore he starts killing his parents murderers one by one. Yuvraj being a cop tries to arrest Raju but fails at it. Watch the movie to see whether Raju is succesful in taking the revenge and whether yuvraj is able to arrest his own brother.

entry.title: Meri Adalat
entry.content:
![Meri Adalat](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/zQHpBwK7q_Y/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Meri Adalat](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/zQHpBwK7q_Y/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Meri Adalat](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/zQHpBwK7q_Y/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Meri Adalat](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/zQHpBwK7q_Y/3.jpg =1580x150)

Shetty (Jayaprakash Reddy) is a powerful mafia leader who along with his right hand, Deva (Gopichand), terrorizes people. Deva has a lover called phoolvati (Raasi) but Shetty sets his eyes on her which is not liked by Deva. In the process, Devau eliminates Shetty and becomes the leader of the mafia gang. Venkateswar (Ranganath) is a fire officer living a peaceful life with his wife and son, Seetaram (Mahesh Babu). In an incident, Deva sets the market place afire and Venkateswar rescues it with his fire fighting and at the same time he slaps Deva. Deva holds grudge against Venkateswar and sends him to jail on a framed charge of murder. Seetaram tries to rescue his father from the jaws of police but in the process, everybody starts asking him for bribe to get the work done. At the end of the day, the police officer kills Venkateswar. Seetaram along with his mother, goes on a violent rampage, decimating the people responsible for the death of his father. Can Seetaram rise to supremacy, battling corrupt officials and dangerous Deva?

entry.title: Jung Ka Elaan
entry.content:
![Jung Ka Elaan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YJOf5gEjQ1E/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Jung Ka Elaan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YJOf5gEjQ1E/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Jung Ka Elaan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YJOf5gEjQ1E/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Jung Ka Elaan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YJOf5gEjQ1E/3.jpg =1580x150)

Ishwar (Darshan), settled in the city remembers the bloodshed between two warring factions in his native town. Several deaths and bloodshed wreaks havoc in the town and the police ask Ishwar to leave the town for good. In the city he takes the alias Ganesh, running a small business. He is also a Good Samaritan in the city helping others in need and taking care of his brother and sister. But with the rise in violence back in his native town, he returns to settle scores with disgruntled elements disrupting peace of the place. He takes up the cause of educating his people and liberating them from the slavery in the quarry business. However war escalates as dangerous goons set out to end Ishwar at any cost. Can Ishwar decimate the villains and rise supreme in his cause?
